name: AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor
desc: An object that represents an axis of numerical data.

items.name: init(title: String, range: ClosedRange<Double>, gridlinePositions: [Double], valueDescriptionProvider: ((Double) -> String))
items.desc: Creates a numeric data axis with the specified title, range, gridline positions, and value description provider closure.

items.name: init(attributedTitle: NSAttributedString, range: ClosedRange<Double>, gridlinePositions: [Double], valueDescriptionProvider: ((Double) -> String))
items.desc: Creates a numeric data axis with the specified attributed title, range, gridline positions, and value description provider closure.

items.name: var valueDescriptionProvider: (Double) -> String
items.desc: A description to speak for a particular data value on the axis.

items.name: enum AXNumericDataAxisDescriptor.ScaleType
items.desc: Constants that describe the scale of a numeric axis.

items.name: var range: ClosedRange<Double>
items.desc: A range that defines the minimum and maximum displayable values for the axis.

items.name: var gridlinePositions: [Double]
items.desc: The positions of the gridlines along the axis.
